Frontend development.hint: Development of user interfaces and client-side web applications using modern frameworks, HTML, CSS and JavaScript

Backend development.hint: Server-side development including APIs, databases, business logic and system architecture

Testing & Quality assurance.hint: Software testing and quality assurance including manual and automated testing, test case development, and quality control processes

Technical support.hint: Installation, configuration and maintenance of computer hardware, software and network systems, providing user assistance and troubleshooting

DevOps & Infrastructure.hint: Implementation and management of continuous integration/delivery pipelines, infrastructure automation, and cloud platform operations

Systems analytics.hint: Analysis and documentation of business processes, system requirements and technical specifications to improve organizational efficiency

Project management.hint: Planning, executing and overseeing IT projects while managing resources, timelines and stakeholder communication using agile methodologies

System administration.hint: Management and maintenance of IT infrastructure including servers, networks, security systems and hardware configurations

Computer Graphics & Game Development.hint: Creation of video games, 3D graphics, animations and interactive experiences using specialized game engines and graphics programming

Mobile development.hint: Development of applications for mobile devices including smartphones and tablets using platform-specific technologies and frameworks

Design.hint: Creation of visual content, user interfaces and graphics using professional design tools and principles

Data Science.hint: Analysis and interpretation of complex data using statistical methods, machine learning and specialized tools

Cybersecurity.hint: Protection of systems, networks and data from digital attacks through security measures and best practices

HR Management.hint: Human resources management including recruitment, personnel administration, onboarding, interviewing and employee relations

Digital Marketing & SEO.hint: Implementation of digital marketing strategies, search engine optimization, social media management and web analytics to improve online visibility

Systems Programming.hint: Development of low-level software that interacts directly with hardware and operating systems using languages like C/C++

1C Development.hint: Development and customization of business applications using the 1C:Enterprise platform popular in CIS countries

Website administration.hint: Management and maintenance of websites including content updates, performance optimization, and technical troubleshooting

Blockchain.hint: Development of decentralized applications and smart contracts using blockchain technologies and cryptocurrencies

Data analytics.hint: Analysis and visualization of business data using specialized tools and platforms to generate insights and support decision-making

Product Management.hint: Strategic planning and development of digital products including feature prioritization, roadmap development and stakeholder management

Network Administration.hint: Design, implementation and maintenance of computer networks including routing, switching, security and network protocols

Database Administration.hint: Management and optimization of database systems including installation, configuration, backup, security and performance tuning

Other.hint: Other category encompasses non-technical and general business roles that fall outside specific IT domains
